info.title: OrbitABM API
info.description: RESTful API for OrbitABM - Account-Based Marketing Campaign Intelligence Platform

get.description: Retrieve a list of companies with optional filtering and pagination
Retrieve a single company by its UUID

Retrieve a single vertical by its UUID

get.description: Retrieve a list of email templates with optional filtering and pagination

Retrieve a single organization by its UUID
